TopicTitle: World War Craft Megathread - Planes, Tanks, Ships, etc.

Articles.Content:
Having been through some threads I've found some excellent craft from both World Wars scattered throughout. I thought it would be a good idea to make a thread for these craft to be shown off properly. Absolutely any plane, vehicle or ship designed and/or built between 1914 and 1950!

Here are some of mine to start off:

Hawker Typhoon IB

Spoiler

 

Firing a full salvo of eight RP-3 rockets.

 

 

Hawker Tempest II & V

Spoiler

 

Mark V

Mark II

 

 

 

 

 

 

Vickers-Supermarine Spitfire, way too many marks

Spoiler

P-51D-5NA

No dorsal fin, single radio antennae, high-altitude V-1650-3 engine

Spoiler

 


 

P-51D-10NA

Dorsal fin, two radio antennae, low-medium altitude V-1650-7 engine

Spoiler

here's mine
Yakovlev Yak-9T (USSR)
has a 30mm chaingun bcs BDA don't have fixed 30mm gun, also with two clipped 12.7mm guns bcs RPM sucs
kinda OP
https://kerbalx.com/dimas_1502/Yakovlev-Yak-9T

Spoiler



Focke-Aghelis Fa-223 (*clip* Germany)
WWII helicopter
not a fighter, but it fits here
no armaments, add it urself
https://kerbalx.com/dimas_1502/Fa-223

Spoiler



Fokker Eindecker E. III (German Empire)
WWI monoplane fighter
two 50cals clipped together, bcs no guns with smaller caliber in BDA
https://kerbalx.com/dimas_1502/Fokker-E-III-ish

Spoiler


 

Edited April 16, 2018 by [INDO]dimas_1502
